summary: The agent report is excellent, accurately identifying root causes and providing logical reasoning. Some minor details and metrics are missing, but overall, it aligns well with the human expert report.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the root causes related to MMDVFS and CM/PowerHal/DDR voting.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly complete but lacks explicit mention of SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics are correctly identified, but some specific percentages are missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and aligns well with the identified causes.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: Suggested fixes are practical and relevant, though not all historical fixes are mentioned.
